name: Explosion at Paint Factory
details: An explosion at a paint factory has released toxic fumes into the surrounding neighborhoods.
rawText: An explosion at a paint factory in Peenya Industrial Area, Bengaluru, has released toxic fumes into the surrounding neighborhoods.

name: Massive Chemical Leak
details: A massive chemical leak has been reported at an industrial facility, prompting officials to evacuate nearby residents.
rawText: A massive chemical leak has been reported at an industrial facility in Lingarajapuram, Bengaluru, prompting officials to evacuate nearby residents.

name: Structural Collapse at Construction Site
details: A structural collapse has occurred at a construction site, trapping several workers and causing panic among bystanders.
rawText: Structural collapse reported at a construction site in Whitefield, Bengaluru, trapping several workers and causing panic.

name: Industrial Boiler Blast
details: An industrial boiler blast occurred at a textile unit, resulting in significant structural damage.
rawText: Industrial boiler blast reported at a textile unit on Hosur Road, Bengaluru, causing significant structural damage.

name: Explosion at Paint Factory
details: An explosion at a paint factory has released toxic fumes into the surrounding neighborhoods.
rawText: An explosion at a paint factory in Peenya Industrial Area, Bengaluru, has released toxic fumes into the surrounding neighborhoods.

name: Transformer Explosion
details: A transformer explosion has caused a local blackout and minor fires in nearby shops.
rawText: A transformer explosion in Koramangala, Bengaluru, has triggered a local blackout and minor fires in nearby shops.
